item.title: Netflix's Well-Reviewed New Zombie Horror Movie Becomes Global Streaming Hit
item.description: A new Netflix zombie horror movie becomes a global hit for the streaming platform in the first week of its release with more than 8 million views.

item.title: What Happened To Curly? Why The Three Stooges Replaced Him With Shemp
item.description: The Three Stooges reached comedy legend status with the lineup of Moe, Curly and Larry, but the lineup eventually had to change for tragic reasons.

item.title: Tim Burtonâ€™s Big Rule For Beetlejuice 2's Returning Characters Avoided A Huge Complaint With Sequels
item.description: Tim Burton's one condition for the characters of Beetlejuice 2 helped the legacy sequel's success by honoring the original's sentiment and magic.
